profile.name: Syuan-Ying(Justin) Wu
profile.summary: Software Engineer with 3+ years of industry experience, specializing in Java and React. Contributed to a SIGIR-accepted demo paper on Information Retrieval. Engaged in the DC Metro Threat Detection System project as a proactive software engineer.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
job_descriptions: Designed and implemented Social Media using Amazon Web Services to enable users to share videos with others
Developed a video feed service using Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Redis, Apache Kafka, and EC2
Built a video upload feature using Node.js, React, and Redux via AWS Lambda, S3, RDS, Elastic Transcoder, and CloudFront
Reduced deployment time of the services through the implementation of CI/CD with Amplify, ECR, Docker, Git, and Maven

experiences.title: Software Engineer(Graduate Assistant)
job_descriptions: Published paper on Washington Metropolitan Area Metro Threat Detection System, accepted at the conference SIGIR 2023
Developed the threat detection system using Node.js, Express.js, Python, and React to aid in earlier detection
Optimized NoSQL queries by the inverted index using Apache Solr to decrease time complexity from O(n) to O(logn)
Improved query time stability in shared MongoDB via Pagination, reducing response time from 1 minute to less than 1 second
Designed and implemented a health-check module using Shell and Crontab to ensure system availability
Integrated Twitter API, News API, and Machine Learning models into the system
Built the CI/CD pipeline utilizing Docker, Git, Maven, and Jenkins, saving 50% of the deployment time

experiences.title: Software Engineer
job_descriptions: Developed credit card systems using Java, Javascript, CSS, HTML, and DB2 for the banks in Taiwan
Optimized performance of SQL for selecting transaction logs and data conversion, reducing the average response time of
selecting time by 60% and the conversion time by 75%
Led a team to fix system vulnerabilities, such as SQL Injection, XSS, and Path Traversal
Designed and developed login and logout features using LDAP
Developed CI/CD pipeline with Azure DevOps for efficient app deployment to production
Performed Stress, Load, and Performance Testing with JMeter to validate system robustness and optimize performance

experiences.title: System Analyst
job_descriptions: Led a project using Google Dialogflow to build a chatbot for a chatting app with cooperators.
Developed a Python program to automatically modify timestamps in GPS files, reducing the time from 4 hours to just 1 second.
Resolved a budget problem caused by Google Maps API revision, saving $4,000 per year.
Created a Shell script to back up files and prevent potential data loss.

personal_projects.title: Online Bookstore
job_descriptions: Developed bookstore website using Vue, JavaScript, Java, and MySQL for online shopping.
Built each service as Restful API using Jersey.

personal_projects.title: URL Shortening Service
job_descriptions: Developed a URL Shortening Service using Java and React to shorten a given URL to a short and memorable one
Used a Microservice architecture, with Spring Boot to develop RESTful services

certificates.name: AZ-204: Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure
